items.title: Hack Your Job Search

visible_instructors.title: Lenann McGookey Gardner

visible_instructors.job_title: The Best Job Search Advice Available!

items.headline: A fun, fresh class that updates your entire approach to getting a job.  100% of buyers (so far) have gotten a better job
objectives_summary: When one of the best sales trainers on the planet turns her attention to helping people get jobs, the advice is fresh and different from the norm.  You have to stand out, and you can't do that if you're dropping your information into a template.

items.title: Mindfully Manage Yourself At Work

objectives_summary: Uncover your hidden mindset that may impact your work efficiency, interpersonal relationships, and team cooperation and collaboration
Increase mindfulness to improve personal and professional relationships
Discover your hidden values and beliefs and its connections to unconscious behaviors and actions

items.headline: Get Insights into key aspects of corporate world that will shape your journey. End the training with an actionable plan

items.title: Mobile Cybersecurity Awareness
items.headline: Learn How to Prevent Data Breaches, Identity Theft and Fraud via Smartphones, Laptops and Tablets
objectives_summary: Lesser known data security risks of free apps like Instagram, Facebook and Twitter, paid apps and mobile malware
The riskiest class of metadata you should know about when it comes to mobile security
Safest way to access public wireless internet hotspots via laptop, iPhone or Android devices

items.title: Intellectual Property Security Awareness
items.headline: How to Use Social Media without Infringing on Trademarks, Copyrights, Trade Secrets and Patents
objectives_summary: Understand the Fair Use exception to copyrighted works on social media
Share coptrighted works online without violating the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
Know how exceeding authorized access violates the Computer Fraud and Abuse Act

items.title: Guerrilla Hiring - Don't Hire Monkeys to Run your Company
items.headline: HIRING SUCKS! Learn my unconventional 'Hiring Secrets' to hire a human instead of a monkey to work for you.
objectives_summary: Train their VA to make important decisions
Understand the right way to interview candidates
Free up most of their time by outsourcing

items.title: The Recruiting Process Steps: From Job Posting to Job Offer
items.headline: Understand the "why" behind each step of the process & increase your success in finding the RIGHT person for your team.
objectives_summary: An understanding of WHY each step of the recruiting process is important
How to create an eye-catching job ad (template included)
What red flags to look for in order to eliminate poor candidates

items.title: Building a Business Case for Talent Management
items.headline: Learn a repeatable framework for getting your C-suite to fund your initiatives and embrace you as a valuable advisor
objectives_summary: How to convert the talent challenge into a business opportunity
How to communicate so the C-Suite pays attention
